Edge AI Technology Gorilla provides innovative solutions across business verticals with edge AI-based technology that unlocks the value of video insights and IoT data. Edge AI Computing We use a combination of machine learning and deep learning through customizing MobileNet SSD, ResNet and more to provide various highly accurate analytics. Intelligent Video Analytics Our multiple AI algorithms collaborate to deliver intelligent video analytics (IVA) that transform data into actionable, real-time insights with people, vehicle, and object identification capabilities. Optimized & Accelerated We fully implement Intel OpenVINO optimization and CPU, VPU, & FPGA acceleration to enable edge devices to analyze more video feeds simultaneously in real time. More About Edge AI IVAR™ Gorilla IVAR™, Intelligent Video Analytics Recorder, is a real-time video analytics solution which creates many benefits in the business and security intelligence fields by being an optimized and performance driven edge AI-based computer vision software.
